ygData.subject: Re: Bloodclaw?
ygData.msgSnippet: Im not quite sure but i have heard that those items are found in the Estate of the Unrest. ... From: Squires, Dean [mailto:DeanSquires@xwavesolutions.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Im not quite sure but i have heard that those items are found in the Estate
of the Unrest.

-----Original Message-----
From: Squires, Dean [mailto:DeanSquires@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 10:44 AM
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Subject: [EverQuest] Bloodclaw?


From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>

Does anyone know where you can find the location of the Bloodclaw or
other Blood items?

Baelstorm
